title: Training & Certification Center
description: Welcome to the AWS Training and Certification Center. Check the latest training schedules and resources.
announcements_workshop_preview: Registration for this year's re:Invent workshops has begun.
announcements_workshop_content: AWS re:Invent 2025 workshop registration is officially open. This year features in-depth workshops on new services and technologies, so register early.
announcements_certification_preview: All AWS certification exam guides have been updated to the latest versions.
announcements_certification_content: All certification exam guides have been updated to reflect the latest AWS services and best practices. Check out the new exam preparation materials.
announcements_news_preview: See the key services and features announced at the last re:Invent.
announcements_news_content: A summary of key services and features announced at AWS re:Invent 2024 is now available. Learn about new AI services, serverless capabilities, and security updates.
calendar.title: Training Schedule Calendar
calendar.select_date_to_view: Select a date to view courses
calendar.please_select_date: Please select a date from the calendar on the left
calendar.courses_will_appear: Training courses for the selected date will appear here
